Articles.Content:
So I just did a mission where I completed seven different contracts with one launch. After I was done, I wanted to go and look at what the total gains for the mission had been and see how much money, science, and rep I'd gained. Unfortunately, the contracts archive only displays in alphabetical order, so I couldn't find the right ones. I'd like to see some sorting tools added similar to those for the science archives (by celestial body and by type), as well as an option to display contracts in chronological order.

Edited February 28, 2017 by Allocthonous

This, thank you. It's crazy when you're looking for that specific one between 368314673 others.

This game needs sorting of all sorts.

Also for the available ones. The weighting system is really bad and I'd rather pick my own contracts than being "guided" by the system. I'm really sick of doing the same contracts over and over again because nothing better is offered to me.
